channel.title: Help Please: NPC Shop w/o a trade with option
channel.description: I'm trying to make a Santa rare shop. Can some one please help me out by explaining how to make Santa have a shop even though he doesn't have a trade option? If he cant have a shop with out a trade option, can some one please tell how to make him have a trade option. Thank you very much. ;)

item.title: Help Please: NPC Shop w/o a trade with option
item.dc:creator: @roberson644 roberson644
item.description:
@roberson644 wrote:

I’m trying to make a Santa rare shop. Can some one please help me out by explaining how to make Santa have a shop even though he doesn’t have a trade option? If he cant have a shop with out a trade option, can some one please tell how to make him have a trade option. Thank you very much.
